title: robelneo
author: robelneo
content: Note: I'm not the owner of the script Only a second-party user based on the license I can configure the Front end or interface of the site.I bought the domain 12 days ago and installed the script three days ago would like to ask what changes should I make on the site also you can try to check the over 48 tools the site has I will be adding more, and once I have more funds.Please check the speed and the result of the tools that you are going to use, this tool is a big help for webmasters to check the performance of their site and information of any website site.What tools do you think are the most important and should be shown on top?The site has the option to be a member only but I prefer to keep it free and will remain free and rely on ad revenue and part of my earnings on my participation in the signature campaign.Once I implement the recommendations. I will lock this thread and create an official announcement in the service Thank you and enjoy using these premium SEO tools just click the image to get redirected to the site

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: A to Z  Oh, you should have asked before you bought it.   First, to ask, did you get access to the account through which the script was purchased?Will you be able to do future updates? Also, The developer has backdoor access, so if your license is not regular, you will probably have complications with it at some point or even delete the script.Otherwise, hidden is quite old and offers a lot of outdated tools, the metrics of which are largely not used for any purpose. Especially not for SEO. Some of the tools don't even give results, and there are other free alternatives for the same. This does not give you any advantage over similar competitors.And those tools that do the function they promise, offer very poor quality results.The good thing is that the developer is working on developing the script, so there is a feeling that someday it will be adjusted to be in line with current standards.Also, as far as I know, no one has managed to add a tool made by another developer. It's locked.The developer has already sold a large number of licenses, so it will be quite difficult for you to reach your audienceOtherwise, there are several much better scripts, even for WP in the same price range. I have a regular license, so I'm talking to you based on personal experienceTo sum it up briefly, this script is almost as if you drove a tractor into a Formula 1 race.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 02, 2023, 12:28:07 AMA to Z  Oh, you should have asked before you bought it.   As a webmaster and developer, I dig deep and review the script and so far everything is good a 4.53 rating is already good coming from the buyers of the script the last update of the script was 18 October 2023QuoteFirst, to ask, did you get access to the account through which the script was purchased?Will you be able to do future updates? Also, The developer has backdoor access, so if your license is not regular, you will probably have complications with it at some point or even delete the script.Only the software developer can do updates I can only configure the front end and about complications and delete how can he all I know is Codecanyon is checking all the scripts for exploits before presenting to the marketplace.I have one script where the developer is nowhere to be found but the script is doing great QuoteOtherwise, hidden is quite old and offers a lot of outdated tools, the metrics of which are largely not used for any purpose. Especially not for SEO. Some of the tools don't even give results, and there are other free alternatives for the same. This does not give you any advantage over similar competitors.And those tools that do the function they promise, offer very poor quality results.I have to believe old users of the script because they are the ones who have tested the script and so far based on my test and all the other tools on Seo is working perfectly, and the competition every niche has competition as a webmaster you should've comfortable with it, as long as you can walk the extra mile QuoteThe good thing is that the developer is working on developing the script, so there is a feeling that someday it will be adjusted to be in line with current standards.Also, as far as I know, no one has managed to add a tool made by another developer. It's locked.The developer has already sold a large number of licenses, so it will be quite difficult for you to reach your audienceEven if the seller sold over 5k or 10k as long as the script worked as promised I'm ok with it, in fact, one of my parameters in buying a script is the number of sales and feedback and so far based on what I see, and research this script delivers and it's up to the user to work on the script to maximize its exposure QuoteOtherwise, there are several much better scripts, even for WP in the same price range. I have a regular license, so I'm talking to you based on personal experienceActually, before buying this script, I had another one that was based on WP but this script is better than the WP script, I can concentrate on configuring instead of adding plugins which will have an impact on the load and changing themes which will takes so much of my time, everything on this script is drag and drop I'm surprised on the installation took me five minutes to install and even a newbie with little knowledge of coding can run this script.Probably one of the easiest scripts I've stumbleQuoteTo sum it up briefly, this script is almost as if you drove a tractor into a Formula 1 race. Tell me how come have you bought this script before?The only problem I have with the script is the URL of the results, which will not show up in the browser.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: You just bought the domain, and unless you got it from an auction where it already has a good backlink history, you're going way ahead of yourself.The first few days or weeks, you will not rank on Google unless lots of people are linking to your site at once.Most of the work, therefore, has to be done on the content - that is, articles, utilities, or whatever it is your site offers.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: UI is beautiful and clean, and I hope that the ads are not annoying, but the tools provided by this script are old and there are better alternatives to them now. Also, artificial intelligence adds a new dimension to these tools instead of being traditional, and some of them can be combined into one tool such as Domain Age Checker/Domain into IP /Whois Checker.I used the first service https://premiumseo.tools/article-rewriter and tried it on your text.QuoteI bought the domain 12 days ago and installed the script three days ago would like to ask what changes should I make on the site also you can try to check the over 48 tools the site has I will be adding more, and once I have more funds.Please check the speed and the result of the tools that you are going to use, this tool is a big help for webmasters to check the performance of their site and information of any website site.QuoteI bought the area 12 days in the past and mounted the script three days in the past would love to ask what adjustments should I make on the web site also you may attempt to check the over 48 equipment the web site has I may be including greater, and as soon as i have more funds.Please check the speed and the end result of the equipment that you're going to apply, this tool is a large help for webmasters to test the overall performance in their site and information of any internet site web site.Article-rewriter is a service for replacing some words with new words without taking into account the wording, and it may lead to weak or incomprehensible results.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on November 02, 2023, 07:31:14 AMYou just bought the domain, and unless you got it from an auction where it already has a good backlink history, you're going way ahead of yourself.The first few days or weeks, you will not rank on Google unless lots of people are linking to your site at once.Most of the work, therefore, has to be done on the content - that is, articles, utilities, or whatever it is your site offers.It's very costly to buy a domain on auction with the keywords I'm looking for. I'm happy with the domain name. I have the keywords where I want to rank in my domain name, but I have to index the site first, ranking in keywords is still a long shot it's still too early for me to lay out a plan, and the site is in the configuring and testing phase.Thanks for dropping by buddy and will implement your recommendation.Quote from: Yamane_Keto on November 02, 2023, 08:02:44 AMUI is beautiful and clean, and I hope that the ads are not annoying, but the tools provided by this script are old and there are better alternatives to them now. Also, artificial intelligence adds a new dimension to these tools instead of being traditional, and some of them can be combined into one tool such as Domain Age Checker/Domain into IP /Whois Checker.Article-rewriter is a service for replacing some words with new words without taking into account the wording, and it may lead to weak or incomprehensible results.I will not use pop on my sites just normal ads I'm ok to earn a few bucks so I can add more add-ons and maintain the site there are a lot of add-ons available to add hopefully I can do more and will contact the developer if there are results on any tool that is not showing the desired results.Thanks for dropping by buddy

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Sounds like it's more technical than I thought, can you just take this to the "services" child board  of the forum and get more vast reviews from technical reviewers. I understand what you want to work on is really important, I'll advise you get a more professional circumspect review to keep you at a safer position.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: I couldnt find your website in similarweb yet, to detect the traffichttps://www.similarweb.com/search/?q=premiumseo.toolsI believe you need to add it to google search console:https://search.google.com/search-console/aboutYou can use websites similar to this one to check how to improve your SEOhttps://freetools.seobility.net/en/seocheck/premiumseo.toolsLighthouse, build-in chrome app, will help you as wellhttps://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/overview/

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 02, 2023, 05:17:23 AMAs a webmaster and developer, I dig deep and review the script and so far everything is good a 4.53 rating is already good coming from the buyers of the script the last update of the script was 18 October 2023I am speaking to you based on personal experience. Maybe you misunderstood me, the script is correct but its purpose is questionable. Most of the tools are useless and have no real use value.For example "Backlink Maker" is a completely wrong tool. Even if it does what it promises, it's all about bad links and it can only bring negative SEO.Tools like "What is my Browser" or "My IP Address" are useless. Text content tools, I tested it and apart from the counters, the others did not meet some of the most basic standards. (plagiarism checker, article rewriter). Sorry, but that's true.btw. If you have a legal license, there a several more free add-ons. You can download it for free. I also have them somewhere, so if it's easier for you, I can share it with you.Also, try to write a description for the tools as soon as possible. Currently, the default is lorem ipsum text, and you don't want Google to index them like that.Quote from: robelneo on November 02, 2023, 05:17:23 AMTell me how come have you bought this script before?Long story. I did something for one member here, installation and adjustment of several sites, mostly faucet scripts, including this AtoZ one. In the end, he was left with some debt for hosting, so the license came into my possession as part of the compensation. On several occasions, I tried a little to promote it, moved it to different domains, but the results were very poor. Even with AdSense ads.Quote from: bitmover on November 02, 2023, 02:44:29 PMI couldnt find your website in similarweb yet, to detect the trafficDomain is just 12 days old, it's too early to be recognized by any service.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 02, 2023, 09:40:04 PMQuote from: robelneo on November 02, 2023, 05:17:23 AMAs a webmaster and developer, I dig deep and review the script and so far everything is good a 4.53 rating is already good coming from the buyers of the script the last update of the script was 18 October 2023I am speaking to you based on personal experience. Maybe you misunderstood me, the script is correct but its purpose is questionable. Most of the tools are useless and have no real use value.For example "Backlink Maker" is a completely wrong tool. Even if it does what it promises, it's all about bad links and it can only bring negative SEO.Tools like "What is my Browser" or "My IP Address" are useless. Text content tools, I tested it and apart from the counters, the others did not meet some of the most basic standards. (plagiarism checker, article rewriter). Sorry, but that's true.btw. If you have a legal license, there a several more free add-ons. You can download it for free. I also have them somewhere, so if it's easier for you, I can share it with you.Also, try to write a description for the tools as soon as possible. Currently, the default is lorem ipsum text, and you don't want Google to index them like that.Quote from: robelneo on November 02, 2023, 05:17:23 AMTell me how come have you bought this script before?Long story. I did something for one member here, installation and adjustment of several sites, mostly faucet scripts, including this AtoZ one. In the end, he was left with some debt for hosting, so the license came into my possession as part of the compensation. On several occasions, I tried a little to promote it, moved it to different domains, but the results were very poor. Even with AdSense ads.Thank you for sharing your experience I appreciate you dropping here and will take note of everything you mentioned, in fact, I'm now in the process of implementing thisQuoteAlso, try to write a description for the tools as soon as possible. Currently, the default is lorem ipsum text, and you don't want Google to index them like that..It's going to be a long shot buddy but I just want one of these to help sites that I'm building up, I did the right thing asking for review here before officially creating an announcement I got a lot of good input coming from developers like you.Thanks for the rich advice and for sharing your experience with this script.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 02, 2023, 10:59:15 AMQuote from: Yamane_Keto on November 02, 2023, 08:02:44 AM--I will not use pop on my sites just normal ads I'm ok to earn a few bucks so I can add more add-ons and maintain the site there are a lot of add-ons available to add hopefully I can do more and will contact the developer if there are results on any tool that is not showing the desired results.If you work hard on one or two tools, you will get better results, but since you cannot access the back-end, I do not think you can do much.Developing one of the tools will help you a lot. For example, all text-based tools have uses in this forum, so developing them may mean free views here. You can also automate some of the tasks carried out by campaign managers and customize the list to be exactly for Bitcointalk forum, such as talkimg.com (Bitcointalk customize hosting service)

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on November 06, 2023, 09:15:52 AMQuote from: robelneo on November 02, 2023, 10:59:15 AMQuote from: Yamane_Keto on November 02, 2023, 08:02:44 AM--I will not use pop on my sites just normal ads I'm ok to earn a few bucks so I can add more add-ons and maintain the site there are a lot of add-ons available to add hopefully I can do more and will contact the developer if there are results on any tool that is not showing the desired results.If you work hard on one or two tools, you will get better results, but since you cannot access the back-end, I do not think you can do much.Developing one of the tools will help you a lot. For example, all text-based tools have uses in this forum, so developing them may mean free views here. You can also automate some of the tasks carried out by campaign managers and customize the list to be exactly for Bitcointalk forum, such as talkimg.com (Bitcointalk customize hosting service)I can disable any of the tools but why should it be disabled I want the platform to be an all-in-one stop for anything related to SEO and freelancing in fact if I have more funds coming I will be adding more add-ons like Currency Converter, Is Your Website Down Right Now, Bitcoin Price Calculator,  thanks to Royse777 for continually having me on his campaign I can develop more projects for the community and for everyone who's looking for tools like this.
